verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:18
verses.text: And the elders of that city shall take that man and chastise him;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:19
verses.text: And they shall amerce him in an hundred shekels of silver, and give them unto the father of the damsel, because he hath brought up an evil name upon a virgin of Israel: and she shall be his wife; he may not put her away all his days.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:20
verses.text: But if this thing be true, and the tokens of virginity be not found for the damsel:
